meanings.sent1: The official stamp was certificatory, ensuring the document's authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The certificatory letter from the university confirmed her completion of the course.
meanings.sent3: The certificatory seal on the diploma made it official and fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was certificatory of her happiness, shining brightly like a gold star.
meanings.sent5: The certificatory handshake sealed the deal, marking the beginning of their partnership.
